Eric Schmidt said that managing Google has become a more complex job as the company has diversified. Larry, Sergey Brin and I have been talking for a long time about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making, he said,.`` For the last 10 years, we have all been equally involved in making decisions. Despite his support for Barack Obama , Colin Powell would make no commitment yet for the 2012 John McCain House race.`` I will always vote for the person who I think is best qualified,'' he said. I am not committed to any candidate until I see all the candidates. I have not yet seen anybody on the Republican side that I am ready to commit to and I am not committed to Barack Obama either.
